name: data
desc: The app metadata and signed renewal and transaction information.

items.name: appAppleId
items.desc: The unique identifier of the app that the notification applies to.

items.name: bundleId
items.desc: The bundle identifier of the app.

items.name: bundleVersion
items.desc: The version of the build that identifies an iteration of the bundle.

items.name: environment
items.desc: The server environment that the notification applies to, either sandbox or production.

items.name: signedRenewalInfo
items.desc: Subscription renewal information signed by the App Store, in JSON Web Signature format.

items.name: signedTransactionInfo
items.desc: Transaction information signed by the App Store, in JSON Web Signature format.
